description:
Rope control has never been easier with these gloves. They protect your hands too when cleaning, climbing via ferrata, or hammering on aid lines.

  • Updated finger construction adds durability
  • Breathable stretch mesh fabric and cush knuckle padding
  • Synthetic leather palms and fingers
  • Hook-and-loop cuff closures
  • Clip-in loop
name: Black Diamond Crag Gloves - Women's
